org.lightningj.paywall.btcpayserver

Class BTCPayServerResponseParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lightningj.paywall.btcpayserver.BTCPayServerResponseParser

  • public class BTCPayServerResponseParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Class parsing JSON responses from BTC Pay Server into value objects. Created by philip on 2018-10-17.

      • parseInvoice

        public Invoice parseInvoice(byte[] jsonResponse)
                     throws javax.json.JsonException
        Method to parse and convert a BTC Pay Server JSON invoice response into a value object invoice.
        Parameters:
        jsonResponse - the jsonResponse as a string.
        Returns:
        the related invoice value object.
        Throws:
        javax.json.JsonException - if problems occurred parsing the json data.
